Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class CommandManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.CommandManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class CommandManager extends Object implements Runnable
This class implements a task that, until termination, takes match-related commands from the match command queue and executes them on the related Game instance. It then returns the response (in broadcast or to the sender Dispatcher). This task is meant to be executed on a separate thread from the main thread (that handles the MatchRegistry), and every Match instance should have one (and only one) CommandManager related to it.
See Also:
  • Match
  • Game

    • setStrategy

      Setter for strategy.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the strategy to use

    • run

      public void run()
      Main operation, repeated until thread termination. Manages the commands in the commands queue. If the queue has at least one element, it takes (blocking method synchronizing on the queue) the first element and executes the manageCommand(Tuple) method.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • manageCommand

      void manageCommand(Tuple<UserCommand,Dispatcher> command)
      Method for the management of a single command of the queue. It does the following:
      • Chooses which strategy to use, checking if the Match is in rejoining state or not
      • Calls the strategy's manageCommand() method
      • Saves the Game state on disk
      • If the game is now ended, sends a END message in broadcast
      Parameters:
      command - a Tuple representing an element of the queue of commands (UserCommand, Dispatcher)
      See Also:
      • StandardCommandStrategy.manageCommand(Tuple, Match)
      • RejoiningCommandStrategy.manageCommand(Tuple, Match)

    • terminateIfEmpty

      private void terminateIfEmpty()

    • sendWinMessage

      private void sendWinMessage(List<Player> winners)
      Helper method that sends the END message to all connected players, specifying that a winner has been found and sending out the winner(s) list (see protocol docs).
      Parameters:
      winners - a list of players that have won the game
